text_en: In LousieÂ´s individual educational program her ways of communication, learning style and preferred activities are described. The program also gives her communication partner information about the preferred ways of communication.
text_sw: Katika programu binafsi ya elimu ya Lousie njia zake za mawasiliano, mtindo wa kujifunza na shughuli za upendeleo zimefafanuliwa. Programu pia humpatia mshirika wake wa mawasiliano taarifa kuhusu njia za upendeleo za mawasiliano.

text_en: This student has a limited repertoire of communication.
text_sw: Mwanafunzi huyu ana kiasi kidogo cha uwezo wa mawasiliano

text_en: She need to be close when communicating.
For some students feeding is an important activity.
text_sw: Kwa baadhi ya wanafunzi kula ni shughuli muhimu.

text_en: Each child is assessed and have got their own individual application program.
text_sw: Kila mtoto anapimwa na kupatiwa programu yake binafsi ya kutumika ambayo ni maalumu.
Cedric ni stadi wa maandishi ya nukta nundu.

text_en: The educational program shows that Cedric has a lot of skills.
text_sw: Programu ya elimu huonyesha kwamba Cedric alikuwa na stadi nyingi.
